qas.question: When did a number of modern movement in Buddhism emerge?
What is the Dalit buddhist movement sometimes called?

context: A number of modern movements or tendencies in Buddhism emerged during the <a0_0>second half of the 20th Century<a0_0/>, including the Dalit Buddhist movement (also sometimes called '<a1_0>neo-Buddhism<a1_0/>'), Engaged Buddhism, and the further development of various Western Buddhist traditions.
